title: Fun Times at Home
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>This color looks good on you, Ayumu-chan! It’s so cute~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>R-, really? Ehehe.... Let me do your nails too, Kotori-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Sure, please do.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Which color would you like?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Hmm~.... Which color do you think works on me, Ayumu-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Let’s see.... Maybe this cherry blossom one.... Or pastel colors like yellow, green, and blue would be good.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Then.... This one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Alright, leave it to me~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>....Waaah, that does look good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah, it fits you! Let me try this color too later.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eh, then I want to do yours as well, Ayumu-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu, I guess we’ll take turns♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
